fields.title: Select your Insured Declared Value (IDV)

values.description: Premiums will be lower if you select this option. However in case your car is damaged beyond repair or gets stolen, you will get a lower payout.
This plan provides a good balance between the IDV and the insurance premium.
This option provides the maximum payout in case your car is damaged beyond repair or gets stolen. However the premiums you pay will be higher.

fields.label: IDV
fields.description: IDV is the total amount the insurer will pay you, in case your car is damaged beyond repair or stolen.

fields.title: Select your Insured Declared Value (IDV)

values.description: Premiums will be lower if you select this option. However in case your car is damaged beyond repair or gets stolen, you will get a lower payout.
This plan provides a good balance between the IDV and the insurance premium.
This option provides the maximum payout in case your car is damaged beyond repair or gets stolen. However the premiums you pay will be higher.

fields.label: IDV
fields.description: IDV is the total amount the insurer will pay you, in case your car is damaged beyond repair or stolen.

defaultValue.description: This option will reduce your premiums but will not provide you undepreciated coverage

values.description: Zero depreciation offers 100% coverage for fibre, rubber and metal parts without deduction of depreciation. This comes with 15-20% extra cost of the standard premium and is recommended for new cars up to 5 years of use.
This option will reduce your premiums but will not provide you undepreciated coverage
